description: a(n) = Sum_{ d divides n } phi(d)*2^(n/d)/(2n).
comments: Offset is 3 because a(2) is 3/2, not an integer. - _Michel Marcus_, Sep 11 2013
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[#]*2^(n/#)&]/(2n); Table[a[n], {n, 3, 36}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 07 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv (n, d, eulerphi(d)*2^(n/d)/(2*n));  \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 11 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 23 2000
